title: Artificial consciousness
preview: My thinking process on what we need to truly achieve artificial consciousness. This post walks through multiple AI algorithms and discusses their shortcomings. By the end, I propose a promising approach that may hold the key humans are looking for.

title: Android camera streaming
preview: This post deals with various problems in developing an streaming Android app. Don't be scared about the programming part, as we will deliver some boxes instead.

title: Synchronize folders across devices
preview: If you just want the tool name, Syncthing + Tailscale. If you want to understand how these tools work (in a funny way), this post is for you.

title: Personal Blog V1
preview: This post doesn't deep dive into using any specific tool or framework. It's more about how I frame my problem and design a solution for it.
